evidence.text: Person B: Yes. With my wife.
Person B: ... We cannot break the law. We can only break ourselves of the law...

Person B: You made sure of that.
Person A: You got this case all wrong.
Person B: No way. M.E. would've flagged it.
Person A: You'd think. But he did five autopsies that day. I checked.
Person A: Let me ask you something: Did you look at ANY other suspects besides James Sythe?
Person A: If you'd done your job, we wouldn't be standing here right now.
